text: Oscar Jack Piastri (born 6 April 2001) is an Australian racing driver, who drives in Formula One (F1) for McLaren. He was part of the Alpine F1 drivers academy from 2020 to 2021. He has won six Grands Prix races in F1 (). ==References== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Australian Formula One drivers Category:Sportspeople from Melbourne
title: Oscar Piastri
